title: Letter from the President — Defense Production Act of 1950 – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
June 13, 2017
Dear Mr. Chairman: (Dear Representative:)(Dear Senator:)In accordance with section 303(a)(6)(A) of the Defense Production Act of 1950, as amended (the “Act”) (50 U.S.C. 4533(a)(6)(A)), I transmit herewith notice of actions to rectify a shortfall in the space industrial base.  The Department of Defense will take actions to target critical technology item shortfalls affecting aerospace structures and fibers, radiation hardened microelectronics, radiation test and qualification facilities, and satellite components and assemblies.I also have included my determination required pursuant to section 303(a)(5) of the Act.  Please find enclosed my determination that these proposed initiatives are essential to the national defense.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
